author: etzovara
body:
#### PR description:

This PR summarises the changes that need to be included to the [cmssw/DQMOffline/JetMET/](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/tree/master/DQMOffline/JetMET) framework in order to include the offline DQM of Scouting jets.


#### PR validation:

The changes have been tested locally producing the expected output.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
title: Developing offline JetMET DQM for Scouting jets
